mapper.insert: insert into mms_data_auth ( postName, authType, employeeId, authContent, creatorId, creatorName, createTime )select #{postName}, #{authType}, #{employeeId}, #{authContent}, #{creatorId}, #{creatorName}, now() from dual where not exists ( select bu from mms_base_staff_info base where base.employeeID=#{creatorId} and bu in ( select base.bu from mms_data_auth auth inner join mms_base_staff_info base on auth.creatorId = base.employeeID where auth.postName=#{postName} ) )
mapper.update: update mms_data_auth auth inner join ( select 1 from dual where not exists (select * from mms_data_auth where postName=#{postName} and creatorId=#{creatorId}) ) temp on auth.postId = #{postId} set auth.postName #{postName}, auth.authType = #{authType}, auth.updateStaffId = #{updateStaffId}, auth.updateStaffName = #{updateStaffName}, auth.updateTime =now()
